                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

2025-04-05 13:19:29.407 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (25ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,

                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId

2025-04-05 13:22:49.360 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

2025-04-05 13:24:13.314 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (22ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

2025-04-05 13:27:57.985 +07:00 [INF] Executed endpoint 'DMCheckSheetAPI.Controllers.CheckSheetController.GetListCheckSheet (DMCheckSheetAPI)'

2025-04-05 13:27:58.003 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (24ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

2025-04-05 13:32:38.937 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (24ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,

                                rc.Level + 1,

                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId

OUTPUT INSERTED.[ItemId]

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

2025-04-05 14:02:17.597 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

2025-04-05 14:04:02.340 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (93ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

2025-04-05 14:07:44.409 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (56ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

SELECT [c].[SheetId], [c].[CancelFlag], [c].[CreateAt], [c].[CreateBy], [c].[FormNO], [c].[SheetCode], [c].[SheetName], [c].[UpdateAt], [c].[UpdateBy]
FROM [CheckSheetMST] AS [c]

2025-04-05 14:10:11.150 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT

                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,

                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )

2025-04-05 14:14:13.754 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (30ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId

                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT

                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content,

                                c.DataType,

                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

2025-04-05 14:38:50.620 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (36ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

2025-04-05 14:39:13.668 +07:00 [INF] Request finished HTTP/1.1 GET http://localhost:5118/api/CheckSheet/ - 200 null application/json; charset=utf-8 35.2068ms
2025-04-05 14:39:13.694 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (37ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

2025-04-05 14:45:07.599 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (36ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

2025-04-05 14:45:36.201 +07:00 [INF] Executed endpoint 'DMCheckSheetAPI.Controllers.CheckSheetController.GetListCheckSheet (DMCheckSheetAPI)'
2025-04-05 14:45:36.203 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
		                        c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath

                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            SELECT

2025-04-05 14:55:10.787 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (48ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath, r.CancelFlag
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        WHERE r.CancelFlag = 0
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

2025-04-05 14:55:36.455 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (37ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath, r.CancelFlag
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        WHERE r.CancelFlag = 0
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath, r.CancelFlag
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        WHERE r.CancelFlag = 0
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

2025-04-06 09:01:32.657 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath, r.CancelFlag
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        WHERE r.CancelFlag = 0
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

2025-04-06 09:05:24.569 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (27ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath, r.CancelFlag
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        WHERE r.CancelFlag = 0
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath, r.CancelFlag
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        WHERE r.CancelFlag = 0
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c

2025-04-06 09:07:41.118 +07:00 [INF] Executed action DMCheckSheetAPI.Controllers.CheckSheetController.GetListCheckSheet (DMCheckSheetAPI) in 17.2139ms
2025-04-06 09:07:41.120 +07:00 [INF] Executed endpoint 'DMCheckSheetAPI.Controllers.CheckSheetController.GetListCheckSheet (DMCheckSheetAPI)'
2025-04-06 09:07:41.121 +07:00 [INF] Request finished HTTP/1.1 GET http://localhost:5118/api/CheckSheet/ - 200 null application/json; charset=utf-8 31.0486ms
2025-04-06 09:07:41.130 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (25ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath, r.CancelFlag
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        WHERE r.CancelFlag = 0
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT

                                c.ItemId,

                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath

                        )

                        WHERE r.CancelFlag = 0

2025-04-06 12:52:35.391 +07:00 [INF] Request finished HTTP/1.1 GET http://localhost:5118/api/CheckSheet/ - 200 null application/json; charset=utf-8 72.3745ms
2025-04-06 12:52:35.615 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (25ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath, r.CancelFlag
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        WHERE r.CancelFlag = 0
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

2025-04-06 13:06:18.441 +07:00 [INF] Executed endpoint 'DMCheckSheetAPI.Controllers.CheckSheetController.GetListCheckSheet (DMCheckSheetAPI)'
2025-04-06 13:06:18.443 +07:00 [INF] Request finished HTTP/1.1 GET http://localhost:5118/api/CheckSheet/ - 200 null application/json; charset=utf-8 34.1331ms
2025-04-06 13:06:18.478 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (43ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath, r.CancelFlag
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        WHERE r.CancelFlag = 0
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

SELECT [c].[SheetId], [c].[CancelFlag], [c].[CreateAt], [c].[CreateBy], [c].[FormNO], [c].[SheetCode], [c].[SheetName], [c].[UpdateAt], [c].[UpdateBy]
FROM [CheckSheetMST] AS [c]

2025-04-06 13:07:24.398 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath, r.CancelFlag
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        WHERE r.CancelFlag = 0
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

2025-04-06 13:08:25.308 +07:00 [INF] Executing OkObjectResult, writing value of type 'DMCheckSheetAPI.Models.ApiResponse`1[[System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[DMCheckSheetAPI.Models.Domain.CheckSheetMST, DMCheckSheetAPI, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], System.Private.CoreLib, Version=8.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e]]'.
2025-04-06 13:08:25.310 +07:00 [INF] Executed action DMCheckSheetAPI.Controllers.CheckSheetController.GetListCheckSheet (DMCheckSheetAPI) in 16.9093ms
2025-04-06 13:08:25.311 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath, r.CancelFlag
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        WHERE r.CancelFlag = 0
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;

                            WITH RecursiveCheckSheet AS (
                            -- Ly danh sch cha (ParentId IS NULL)
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                0 AS Level,
                                CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            WHERE c.ParentId IS NULL

                            UNION ALL

                            -- Ly danh sch con v tip tc to th t OrderPath
                            SELECT 
                                c.SheetId,
                                c.ItemId, 
                                c.ParentId, 
                                c.Content, 
                                c.OrderNumber,
                                c.DataType,
                                c.CancelFlag,
                                rc.Level + 1, 
                                CAST(rc.Path + '.' + CAST(c.ItemId AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS Path,
                                CAST(rc.OrderPath + '.' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.SheetId, c.ParentId ORDER BY c.OrderNumber) AS VARCHAR(MAX)), 3) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS OrderPath
                            FROM CheckSheetItemMST c
                            INNER JOIN RecursiveCheckSheet rc ON c.ParentId = rc.ItemId
                        )
                        SELECT cs.SheetId, cs.FormNO, cs.SheetCode, cs.SheetName, r.ItemId, r.ParentId, r.Content, r.OrderNumber, r.DataType, r.Level, r.OrderPath, r.CancelFlag
                        FROM RecursiveCheckSheet as r
                        LEFT JOIN CheckSheetMST as cs ON r.SheetId = cs.SheetId
                        WHERE r.CancelFlag = 0
                        ORDER BY r.SheetId, r.OrderPath;
